Event.MetaDescription: South Indian Society celebrates Deepavali/Diwali Celebrations 2010 in Wembley, London. Come and celebrate 2010 deepavali/diwali with South Indian Society.
Event.Address: Patidar Hall, 22 London Road, Wembley, HA9 7EX.
Event.Maindescription:
Happy Deepavali to your loved ones and you from the Trustees of your South Indian Society.

Thanks to all who have confirmed their participation in the Deepavali celebrations of your society to be held on Saturday, 13th November.

Come and join in the Kalai Kadamba Nigazhchi by children, young adults and adults to have an enjoyable cultural evening finishing off with delicious dinner.

Admission: £ 7 for members, £ 10 for non-members and £ 5 for children 5 to 12 years.

If you have not already confirmed you participation, please do so immediately by contacting one of the Trustees or send a mail to southindiansociety.london2010@googlemail.com

Looking forward to meeting you all soon.

]]>
